title: Một Giấc Mộng Xưa (旧梦一场)
lyrics: tone    zong you ji duan jiu ai tan hua yi sha fen fang huan ji ren hua guo meng de zhong yang mei ci hui shou jian zong liu yi mo chou chan pin cou tian man ban sheng fu xiang bu xie shui shuo qing guo yuan jin you duo huang liang wang hu suo yi jian ai de chi kuang yi bie liang kuan xi shu ceng ji guo wang meng zhong ni hai ru dang chu mo yang zao zhi jing hong yi chang he bi qing shen yi wang zuo ri ren qu lou kong lei wei liang dao bu jin yuan ben wu chang qing ru feng guo shui tang hong chen nan tao ji ci ren shou hua huang      bu xie shui shuo qing guo yuan jin you duo huang liang wang hu suo yi jian ai de chi kuang yi bie liang kuan xi shu ceng ji guo wang meng zhong ni hai ru dang chu mo yang zao zhi jing hong yi chang he bi qing shen yi wang zuo ri ren qu lou kong lei wei liang dao bu jin yuan ben wu chang qing ru feng guo shui tang hong chen nan tao ji ci ren shou hua huang zao zhi jiu meng yi chang mo tan xin ru shui liang dong qu chun hui hua you man shan gang shui bu shi zhen zhen gan shang wu chu gan tan liang hang ta ri zong you mou ren yi shi qing zhang ta ri zong you mou ren yi shi qing zhang
